item.title: DeepSeek 少了 Moby，多了 Wannabe？
item.description:
人工智能的后起之秀鲸鱼在市场上引起的轰动正逐渐被大科技公司的老牌利维坦所侵蚀。【原文：

The market splash made by AI’s upstart whale is steadily being erased by Big Tech’s established leviathans.

】

item.title: 英格兰银行掘金者应对特朗普掀起的狂潮
item.description:
在伦敦城街道深处的一个地下金库中，一个小团队正在匆忙赶制交易员的订单，以便将他们的金块转移到纽约。【原文：

In a subterranean vault deep under the streets of the City of London, a small team is rushing to keep up with traders' orders to move their bullion to New York. 

】

item.title: 英国最经济实惠的住宅在哪里？
item.description:
Skipton集团首席执行官斯图尔特-海尔（Stuart Haire）在本周的《In the City》节目中给出了答案。【原文：

Skipton Group chief executive Stuart Haire has the answer on this week’s episode of In the City. 

】

item.title: 尼日利亚央行暂停积极加息行动
item.description: 尼日利亚央行可能将在周四晚些时候维持利率稳定，暂停激进的紧缩周期，因为在数据计算方法修订后，通胀急剧放缓。【原文：Nigeria’s central bank will probably hold interest rates steady later on Thursday, pausing an aggressive tightening cycle after inflation slowed sharply following a revision to how the data is calculated.】

item.title: 日本央行上田与石破茂举行例会讨论经济问题
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫表示，在下周召开20国集团会议之前，他与首相石破茂举行了例行会议，就经济和金融市场交换了意见。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda said he held a regular meeting with Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba to exchange views on the economy and financial markets ahead of a Group of 20 meeting next week.】

item.title: 传送带寿司连锁店将因股东福利而大涨
item.description: 日本传送带寿司店运营商库拉寿司公司（Kura Sushi Inc.【原文：Shares of Kura Sushi Inc., an operator of conveyor-belt sushi restaurants in Japan, are set to surge after the company said that it will resume offering perks to investors.】

item.title: 新加坡汽车通行证、主权财富基金助力盈余
item.description: 根据本周二公布的预算数据，新加坡政府从接近历史最高水平的汽车许可证拍卖、所得税和国家财富基金捐款中获得的资金比最初预期的多数十亿美元。【原文：The Singapore government sourced billions of dollars more than it initially expected from the auction of near-record high car permits, income tax and contributions from its state wealth funds, according to budget data released on Tuesday.】

item.title: 人工智能助推个人电脑复苏，联想利润超出预期
item.description: 联想集团有限公司（Lenovo Group Ltd.）的季度利润超出预期，凸显了人工智能基础设施支出正在如何帮助全球个人电脑市场走出长达数年的低谷。【原文：Lenovo Group Ltd.’s quarterly profit beat projections, highlighting how AI infrastructure spending is helping pull the global PC market out of a years-long funk.】

item.title: Blackstone 旗下 Airtrunk 计划发行 ABS 债券以推动亚洲增长
item.description: 据熟悉此事的人士透露，Blackstone Inc. 正考虑利用资产支持证券市场为其去年收购的澳大利亚约会中心公司 AirTrunk Pte. 的扩张计划提供资金。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is considering tapping the asset-backed securities market to fund the expansion plans of AirTrunk Pte., an Australia-based date center firm that it acquired last year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 创纪录的美国液化天然气出口或将缓解欧洲和亚洲买家的压力
item.description: 随着新项目产量的增加，美国的液化天然气出口继续刷新纪录，这一趋势可能有助于缓解欧洲和亚洲的高价格。【原文：US liquefied natural gas exports have extended a record-breaking run as new projects increased production, a trend that could help to ease high prices in Europe and Asia.】

item.title: 矿产商皮尔巴拉看到中国矿山重启带来的锂需求反弹
item.description: 澳大利亚最大的纯锂生产商皮尔巴拉矿业有限公司（Pilbara Minerals Ltd.）表示，随着中国一个大型矿山和精炼厂的重新开工，该公司的需求将有所恢复，尽管该公司在半年财报中出现了净亏损。【原文：Australia’s largest pure-play lithium producer Pilbara Minerals Ltd. said it sees demand recovering on the restart of a large mine and refinery in China, even as it reported a net loss in its half-year earnings.】

item.title: 贸易部长吴邦国表示，特朗普对加拿大征收关税 "毫无意义
item.description: 加拿大贸易部长玛丽-吴（Mary Ng）表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税只会让美国人的商品更加昂贵，她重申，如果加拿大最大的贸易伙伴继续征收进口关税，加拿大将誓言报复。【原文：President Donald Trump’s tariffs only make goods more expensive for Americans, said Canada’s Trade Minister Mary Ng, reiterating a vow to retaliate if the country’s largest trading partner goes forward with import duties.】

item.title: 日本央行加息押注升温，日元兑美元汇率升至年内最强
item.description: 由于越来越多的人猜测日本央行迟早会加息，日元兑美元汇率周四创下12月以来的最强水平，跑赢了所有主要货币的表现。【原文：The yen hit its strongest level against the dollar since December, beating all major currencies’ performance on Thursday amid growing speculation the Bank of Japan will hike rates sooner rather than later.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行行长豪瑟称维持利率将导致 CPI 下滑
item.description: 澳大利亚央行副行长安德鲁-豪瑟（Andrew Hauser）表示，根据澳大利亚央行的评估，今年维持利率不变将导致核心通胀率低于 2.5% 的 CPI 目标中点。【原文：Australia’s central bank assessed that keeping interest rates unchanged this year would have resulted in core inflation going below the 2.5% midpoint of its CPI target, Deputy Governor Andrew Hauser said.】

item.title: 特朗普称将检查诺克斯堡的黄金储存量
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统说，他的政府打算确保诺克斯堡所持有的大量美国黄金储备得到准确的核算。【原文：President Donald Trump said his administration intends to ensure that the significant amount of US gold reserves held at Fort Knox is accounted for and accurate.】

item.title: 农民抗议大米价格过低，泰国将援助大米市场
item.description: 在农民因大米价格下跌而加紧在曼谷举行抗议活动之后，泰国政府正在考虑采取措施支持国内大米市场。【原文：Thailand’s government is considering measures to support the domestic rice market after farmers stepped up protests in Bangkok in the face of falling prices.】

item.title: 印度央行公告显示印度消费可能反弹
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 印度消费类股遭遇史上最严重亏损，减税反弹势头消退
item.description: 随着投资者的关注焦点重新回到疲软的需求上，减税推动的印度主要消费品股的涨势已经失去了动力。【原文：A tax-cut fueled rally in India’s consumer staples shares has lost steam as investor focus reverts back to weak demand.】

item.title: 魁北克养老金经理斥责卡车公司 TFI 计划迁往美国
item.description: 加拿大卡车运输和物流公司 TFI International Inc. 表示将把总部迁往美国，这招致了其最大股东之一的批评。【原文：Canadian trucking and logistics company TFI International Inc. said it will move its headquarters to the US, earning criticism from one of its largest shareholders.】

item.title: 日本央行越来越难忽视食品通胀问题
item.description: 随着大米和卷心菜等主食价格的飙升，日本的食品通胀成为管理每月预算的家庭的热门话题，也日益成为中央银行的热门话题。【原文：Food inflation in Japan is a hot topic for households managing monthly budgets — and increasingly for the central bank as well, as prices for staples including rice and cabbage soar.】

item.title: 花旗印度计划购买 10 亿美元资产支持证券
item.description: 花旗集团印度分部将购买创纪录的资产抵押证券，因为国内贷款机构在存款增长疲软的情况下寻求流动性。【原文：Citigroup Inc.’s India unit is set to buy record asset-backed securities as domestic lenders seek liquidity amid sluggish deposit growth.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利放弃看空 MSCI 中国指数，认为有 4% 的上涨空间
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的策略师们放弃了看跌中国股市的观点，转而对中国股市持更加乐观的态度，他们跟随华尔街的同行们预测，在中国技术突破的刺激下，中国股市将出现更加可持续的反弹。【原文：Morgan Stanley strategists shed their bearish view on Chinese stocks to turn more optimistic, following Wall Street peers in predicting a more sustainable rally spurred by the country’s technological breakthrough.】

item.title: 澳大利亚出资 15 亿美元援助古普塔钢铁厂
item.description: 大亨桑吉夫-古普塔（Sanjeev Gupta）拥有的一家澳大利亚钢铁厂将获得政府 24 亿澳元（15 亿美元）的一揽子救助计划，一天前，该厂因未偿还债务被迫进入破产管理。【原文：An Australian steelworks owned by tycoon Sanjeev Gupta will receive a A$2.4 billion ($1.5 billion) government bailout package, a day after it was forced into administration due to unpaid debts.】

item.title: 嘉能可考虑减产，中国煤炭价格将进一步下跌
item.description: 矿业巨头嘉能可公司（Glencore Plc）在煤炭价格跌至近十年来最低点后被迫考虑减产，中国煤炭市场的低迷可能会持续数月，对全球市场造成压力。【原文：China’s coal slump is likely to persist for several months, weighing on a global market that has seen mining giant Glencore Plc forced to consider output cuts after prices dropped to near their lowest this decade.】

item.title: 斯威夫特称美元在全球交易中的使用率超过 50
item.description: 1 月份，美元在全球贸易中的优势不断攀升，在通过金融信息服务 Swift 发送的所有国际外汇交易中，美元的交易量略高于一半。【原文：The dollar’s prowess in global trade climbed in January, accounting for just over half of all the international foreign-exchange traffic sent via the financial messaging service Swift.】

item.title: 澳大利亚银行股因利润率担忧损失 260 亿澳元
item.description: 在两家最大的贷款机构报告利润率压力增大后，本周澳大利亚银行股下跌了 260 亿澳元，这加剧了人们对该行业盈利能力的担忧。【原文：A $26 billion rout in Australia bank stocks this week after two of the biggest lenders reported increasing margin pressure is fueling concern about the sector’s profitability.】

item.title: 失业率攀升，澳大利亚招聘仍持续增长
item.description: 澳大利亚 1 月份的失业率进一步上升，尽管招聘人数超出预期，这凸显出就业人数未能跟上求职人数的增长速度。【原文：Australia’s unemployment rate rose further in January even as hiring exceeded expectations, highlighting that employment has failed to keep pace with the number of people looking for work.】

item.title: 慧科停牌，前首席执行官怀特的未来成焦点
item.description: 慧科全球有限公司（WiseTech Global Ltd. ）的股票在悉尼停牌，董事会尚未公布最新的治理情况，这加剧了人们对该公司备受指责的创始人理查德-怀特（Richard White）未来的关注。【原文：WiseTech Global Ltd. shares were halted in Sydney before a governance update from the board, intensifying focus on the future of the company’s under-fire founder, Richard White.】

item.title: 英国消费者信心降至工党执政以来最低点
item.description: 在工党政府执政期间，英国家庭的信心降至新低，因为消费者担心物价上涨，而企业则警告说，工资税的增加将对招聘造成冲击。【原文：Confidence among UK households slipped to a new low under the Labour government, as consumers brace for higher prices and businesses warn of a hiring hit from rising payroll taxes.】

item.title: 慈善机构警告：英国电网公司赚取通胀带来的意外之财
item.description: 一份新的报告显示，由于监管漏洞，电网公司在过去四年中获得了超额利润，其借款计划与高通胀水平挂钩。【原文：Grid companies earned outsize profits over the last four years because of regulatory gaps, with their borrowing plans linked to high inflation levels, according to a new report.】
